column5: WE will be upgrading the software sometime Monday or Tuesday. This will be done in off-peak hours and should not affect your ability to view the site. It is a minor upgrade for each component and addresses minor bugs and enhances security. More info available here.
Well I noticed an improvement. My refersh rate after a post is alot quicker. Usually it takes 5-10 secs not its like 1-2 secs.   So its working!! Good job!! I noticed it yesterday.   dsn
